channel.title: NSManagedObject Subclass on Andrew Bancroft
channel.description: Recent content in NSManagedObject Subclass on Andrew Bancroft

item.title: Core Data: Solving Ambiguous Type / Redeclaration of Type
item.description: I just finished roasting some coffee from Peru. I’ve never had it before, but it got me thinking about my Roaster On the Go “app” as I thought about the context that I could use to show you the solution to the compiler error described in the title. I used this to demonstrate Working with Unwind Segues Programmatically in Swift, but now I’m going to use it to show you how to resolve these errors that can crop up when you’re implementing NSManagedObject subclasses for your Core Data Entities.

item.title: Implement NSManagedObject Subclass in Swift
